info.title: XLS parser for developers
info.description:
We have developed a simple solution that allows you to read large xls files and save data to the database mysql.

NoXLS — can read huge excel files, more than 10 000 rows.

NoXLS — can read excel files since Excel 97.

NoXLS — can work even on shared hosting.

Good solution for PHP developers.

post.description: Create new request for parsing XLS file.
